name: date-fns-example-webpack2
description: Example of date-fns usage with Rollup
author: Sasha Koss <koss@nocorp.me>

scripts.build: yarn run build-date-fns && yarn run build-rollup && yarn run build-babel-minify
scripts.build-rollup: yarn run build-rollup-example && yarn run build-rollup-fp && yarn run build-rollup-misc
scripts.build-babili: yarn run build-babili-example && yarn run build-babili-fp && yarn run build-babili-misc && yarn run stats-size
scripts.test: yarn run test-example && yarn run test-fp && yarn run test-misc
